document.docAuthor: Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo, Pacheco-Chaves, Bernald, Springer, Monika & Cordeiro, Isabelle Da Rocha Silva
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Rhagovelia (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Veliidae) from Costa Rica, with a key and new records from the country

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Rhagovelia (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Veliidae) from Costa Rica, with a key and new records from the country

subSubSection.paragraph:
Known distribution in Costa Rica .
San José (
Hungerford 1939
,
Bacon 1956
). Reported here are the first records from Alajuela, Guanacaste, Heredia, Limón, and Puntarenas provinces.

Material examined. COSTA RICA : Alajuela —San Carlos, Florencia, La Vieja River, powerhouse of Hydropower Station Chocosuela II, 325 m a.s.l.,
